ripple.desc: Configure material ripple (disable it by setting it to 'false' or supply a config object)
examples: { early: true, center: true, color: 'teal', keyCodes: [] }

size.desc: QChip size name or a CSS unit including unit name

dark.desc: Notify the component that the background is a dark color

icon.desc: Icon name following Quasar convention; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix

icon-right.desc: Icon name following Quasar convention; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix

icon-remove.desc: Icon name following Quasar convention; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix

label.desc: Chip's content as string; overrides default slot if specified

color.desc: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

text-color.desc: Overrides text color (if needed); Color name from the Quasar Color Palette

value.desc: Model of the component determining if QChip should be rendered or not

selected.desc: Model for QChip if it's selected or not

square.desc: Sets a low value for border-radius instead of the default one, making it close to a square

clickable.desc: Is QChip clickable? If it's the case, then it will add hover effects and emit 'click' events

removable.desc: If set, then it displays a 'remove' icon that when clicked the QChip emits 'remove' event

default.desc: This is where QChip content goes, if not using 'label' property

click.desc: Emitted on QChip click if 'clickable' property is set

update:selected.desc: Used by Vue on 'selected.sync' prop for updating its value

remove.desc: Works along with 'value' and 'removable' prop. Emitted when toggling rendering state of the QChip
